lbfgsb

Class Wrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • lbfgsb.Wrapper

  • public class Wrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    A more low-level wrapper for the L-BFGS-B algorithm. It is used internally by the Minimizer class.
    Author:
    Mateusz Kobos
